title: IMS Guide
subtitle: Migrating from VMware 5.5+ to Red Hat Virtualization 4.2.8 or Red Hat OpenStack Platform 13+

abstract.para: This guide describes how to plan, perform, and troubleshoot a migration of virtual machines from VMware 5.5 to Red Hat Virtualization 4.2.8 or Red Hat OpenStack Platform 13. The migration is performed using Red Hat CloudForms 4.7, the user interface that enables you to manage these complex environments.
